summary: On a single day on a single street, with the DNA of just a couple of hundred random people, National Geographic Channel sets out to trace the ancestral footsteps of all humanity.
cast: Kevin Bacon|Michelle DeJesus|George Delis|Mehmet Demirci|Necla Demirci|Clive Finlayson|Kerry Nicholson Gonzalez|Jorge J. title: The Human Family Tree
